hydra.Description: Hydra is a very well-known and respected network log on cracker (password cracking tool)

arpspoof.Description: Man in the middle attack between client and server

sslsplit.Description: SSLsplit is a tool for man-in-the-middle attacks against SSL/TLS encrypted network connections.

tftp.Description: Trivial File Transfer Protocol (TFTP) is an Internet software utility for transferring files that is simpler to use than the File Transfer Protocol (FTP) but less capable.

binwalk.Description: Binwalk is a fast, easy to use tool for analyzing, reverse engineering, and extracting firmware images..

apktools.Description: A tool for reverse engineering 3rd party, closed, binary Android apps..

baudrate.Description: Finding the baud rate of serial connections.

killerbee.Description: This is KillerBee - Framework and Tools for Attacking ZigBee and IEEE 802.15.4 networks..

kismet.Description: Kismet is a network detector, packet sniffer, and intrusion detection system for 802.11 wireless LANs.

jdcore.Description: Java decompiler, can decompile apk and jar file

firmwalker.Description: A simple bash script for searching the extracted or mounted firmware file system.

minicom.Description: Minicom is a text-based modem control and terminal emulation program for Unix-like operating systems

sqlmap.Description: sqlmap is an tool that automates the process of detecting and exploiting SQL injection flaws

csrf.Description: generate poc HTML file for the csrf attack

dirb.Description: DIRB is a Web Content Scanner. It looks for existing Web Objects by launching a dictionary based attack against a web server
